nodes.text: The Auril sector was located in the Outer Rim Territories. Planets located in this sector included Ossus, Murkhana, Bal'demnic, the Auril systems, and the Cron Drift asteroid field.

When a superweapon caused the primary of the Cron system to go supernova, the shockwave destroyed three systems in the sector. The giant gas cloud, the Cron Drift, comprised a large majority of the sector.

Straight from the Horse's Mouth: A Guide to the Tales of the Jedi Universe, Part 1, published in Star Wars Insider 26 placed the Auril sector in the "Galactic Core". However earlier sources like the Star Wars Encyclopedia, and later sources such as the Databank have placed it in the Outer Rim Territories.
